issue.title: Managing SSH public key in the backend
issue.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

In the ideal case, the administrator should be able to manage SSH public keys of remote server directly in the Joomla! backend.
The use of the KeyStore class Java API("doc here":http://download.oracle.com/javase/6/docs/api/java/security/KeyStore.html) would facilitate this implementation.

An implementation could also be done to monitor the experacy date of certificates.
